title: What were the key Wimbledon qualifying results?
description: Wimbledon qualifying concluded with a busy day of action on Thursday, when a host of players earned a main-draw spot at the grass-court major. Chris Rodesch upset top seed Marton Fucsovics, a two-time ATP Tour champion, 6-3, 6-4, 0-6, 7-6(4). Giulio Zeppieri defeated 2022 quarter-finalist Cristian Garin 1-6, 6-2, 6-4, 5-7, 7-5. Former Top 20 star Adrian Mannarino beat Li Tu 3-6, 6-3, 6-4, 6-4, while Nicolas Jarry defeated Lukas Klein 6-4, 6-2, 6-4. Nikoloz Basilashvili eliminated Juan Pablo Ficovich 1-6, 7-5, 6-2, 6-1 and Frenchman Arthur Cazaux dispatched Dusan Lajovic 6-7(4), 6-2, 6-3, 6-4. View all Thursday qualifying results from London below or click here to catch up on scores from all of the day's matches. Results - Thursday, QR3 Chris Rodesch (LUX) def. [1] Marton Fucsovics (HUN) 6-3, 6-4, 0-6, 7-6(4) James McCabe (AUS) def. [5] Tomas Barrios Vera (CZE) 4-6, 6-3, 7-6(5), 7-6(7) [6] Valentin Royer (FRA) def. Titouan Droguet (FRA) 6-3, 6-4, 6-2 [7] Arthur Cazaux (FRA) def. [26] Dusan Lajovic (SRB) 6-7(4), 6-2, 6-3, 6-4 Giulio Zeppieri (ITA) def. [8] Cristian Garin (CHI) 1-6, 6-2, 6-4, 5-7, 7-5 [16] Nikoloz Basilashvili (GEO) def. Juan Pablo Ficovich (ARG) 1-6, 7-5, 6-2, 6-1 [18] Adrian Mannarino (FRA) def. Li Tu (AUS) 3-6, 6-3, 6-4, 6-4 [WC] Oliver Tarvet (GBR) def. Alexander Blockx (BEL) 6-3, 3-6, 6-2, 6-1 [30] Filip Misolic (AUT) def. Benjamin Hassan (LEB) 2-6, 7-6(6), 7-6(5), 6-3 [32] Nicolas Jarry (CHI) def. Lukas Klein (SVK) 6-4, 6-2, 6-4 Alex Bolt (AUS) def. Martin Landaluce (ESP) 6-1, 6-2, 6-4 August Holmgren (DEN) def. Yosuke Watanuki (JPN) 6-4, 6-7(2), 3-6, 7-6(11), 7-6(7) Shintaro Mochizuki (JPN) def. Dominic Stricker (SUI) 7-6(3), 3-6, 6-2, 6-4 Leandro Riedi (SUI) def. [WC] Hamish Stewart (GBR) 6-3, 4-6, 6-3, 6-4 Beibit Zhukayev (KAZ) def. Luka Pavlovic (FRA) 3-6, 6-3, 6-2, 7-6(5) [NEWSLETTER FORM]

html:
Wimbledon

Home favourite Tarvet, Bolt, Rodesch, Mannarino among Thursday winners

June 26, 2025

Julian Finney/Getty Images

Wimbledon is the third Grand Slam tournament of the season. By ATP Staff

Wimbledon qualifying concluded with a busy day of action on Thursday, when a host of players earned a main-draw spot at the grass-court major.

Chris Rodesch upset top seed Marton Fucsovics, a two-time ATP Tour champion, 6-3, 6-4, 0-6, 7-6(4). Giulio Zeppieri defeated 2022 quarter-finalist Cristian Garin 1-6, 6-2, 6-4, 5-7, 7-5.

Former Top 20 star Adrian Mannarino beat Li Tu 3-6, 6-3, 6-4, 6-4, while Nicolas Jarry defeated Lukas Klein 6-4, 6-2, 6-4. Nikoloz Basilashvili eliminated Juan Pablo Ficovich 1-6, 7-5, 6-2, 6-1 and Frenchman Arthur Cazaux dispatched Dusan Lajovic 6-7(4), 6-2, 6-3, 6-4.

View all Thursday qualifying results from London below or click here to catch up on scores from all of the day's matches.

Results - Thursday, QR3
Chris Rodesch (LUX) def. [1] Marton Fucsovics (HUN) 6-3, 6-4, 0-6, 7-6(4)
James McCabe (AUS) def. [5] Tomas Barrios Vera (CZE) 4-6, 6-3, 7-6(5), 7-6(7)
[6] Valentin Royer (FRA) def. Titouan Droguet (FRA) 6-3, 6-4, 6-2
[7] Arthur Cazaux (FRA) def. [26] Dusan Lajovic (SRB) 6-7(4), 6-2, 6-3, 6-4
Giulio Zeppieri (ITA) def. [8] Cristian Garin (CHI) 1-6, 6-2, 6-4, 5-7, 7-5
[16] Nikoloz Basilashvili (GEO) def. Juan Pablo Ficovich (ARG) 1-6, 7-5, 6-2, 6-1
[18] Adrian Mannarino (FRA) def. Li Tu (AUS) 3-6, 6-3, 6-4, 6-4
[WC] Oliver Tarvet (GBR) def. Alexander Blockx (BEL) 6-3, 3-6, 6-2, 6-1
[30] Filip Misolic (AUT) def. Benjamin Hassan (LEB) 2-6, 7-6(6), 7-6(5), 6-3
[32] Nicolas Jarry (CHI) def. Lukas Klein (SVK) 6-4, 6-2, 6-4
Alex Bolt (AUS) def. Martin Landaluce (ESP) 6-1, 6-2, 6-4
August Holmgren (DEN) def. Yosuke Watanuki (JPN) 6-4, 6-7(2), 3-6, 7-6(11), 7-6(7)
Shintaro Mochizuki (JPN) def. Dominic Stricker (SUI) 7-6(3), 3-6, 6-2, 6-4
Leandro Riedi (SUI) def. [WC] Hamish Stewart (GBR) 6-3, 4-6, 6-3, 6-4
Beibit Zhukayev (KAZ) def. Luka Pavlovic (FRA) 3-6, 6-3, 6-2, 7-6(5)
